tiers.name: facts_self_improve
questions: Add a unit test for a new API endpoint that returns robot status JSON; include a mock and assert keys mode, hardware_mode, and allow_motion.
Implement a log rotation for trainer metrics to keep only the last 5 files; describe the minimal code changes.
Write a short checklist to validate RLDS episode JSON before training (fields: obs, action, reward, done).
Propose a minimal refactor to inject a model_hint into the chat adapter without breaking existing call sites.
Design a tiny health probe that pings the /api/status endpoint and emits a warning when latency > 500ms.
